resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

fields.summary: ZKRMStateStore: Limit the number of znodes under a znode

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: RM startup failure with old state store due to version mismatch

comments.body:
[~varun_saxena]
+1 patch looks good to me. But why {{1.4}} and not {{1.3}} ?
Will wait for [~templedf] / [~kasha] coments too.

One minor comment

Better to add comment too in ZkStateStore about the version change.
{code}
1.1 to 1.2 change for  following
Note: Changes from 1.1 to 1.2 - AMRMTokenSecretManager state has been saved
1.2 to 1.3
Changes from 1.2 to 1.3, Addition of ReservationSystem state.
{code}

1.4 because there is some change. Previous version was 1.3
Will add the comment as suggested.

This message was automatically generated.
Yes. Testcase failure are tracked by 5548. i  will commit this jira by monday.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #11856 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/11856/])
YARN-6703. RM startup failure with old state store due to version (bibinchundatt: rev d64c842743da0d9d91c46985a9fd7350ea14b204)
* (edit) hadoop-yarn-project/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-server/hadoop-yarn-server-resourcemanager/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/resourcemanager/recovery/ZKRMStateStore.java

Thank you [~varun_saxena] for patch and [~templedf] for review
Committed to trunk and branch-2

Thanks [~bibinchundatt] for finding the issue and committing it.
Thanks [~templedf] for reviews.
